title: Maniac

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If you are the only Neutral (Killing) role at the start of the game, you may attack 2 players instead.

> You clean everyone you kill, but you still learn their role and receive their will.

> Once per game, you may attack an additional player at night and all your kills that night will be unstoppable.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:

*It can cut you like a knife, if the gift becomes the fire*
*On a wire between will and what will be.*
